timeline.message:
switched PersistenceExtensions to ZonedDateTime

Signed-off-by: Kai Kreuzer <kai@openhab.org>

moved and adapted persistence itests

Signed-off-by: Kai Kreuzer <kai@openhab.org>

fixed integration tests

Signed-off-by: Kai Kreuzer <kai@openhab.org>

timeline.bodyText: Are the removals in this class because the rule engine already gets this information provided by ActionServices?
timeline.author: wborn

replies.bodyText: Yes, exactly. This seemed duplicated and I checked that it works without it.
replies.author: kaikreuzer

replies.bodyText: Then we can safely merge this. 👍
replies.author: wborn
